titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation touching the adjourning of part of Hillary terme
Proclamations. 1642-12-27.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649. aut

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at His Majesties Court at Oxford, the 27 day of December, in the eighteenth year of his reigne.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
